footer.description: Subscribe to see the world through the lightness of watercolor and be part of my creative journey. Welcome!

mainpage.heroDescription: I paint with watercolors, capture life's moments, and share them with you!
mainpage.featuresDescription: Hello everyone! My name is Yuliya Kalashnikova, and I'm a watercolor artist. My blog is about an artist's journey, love for nature, hometown, and family, plein air painting, and watercolors. I'm happy to have you here!
mainpage.emailDescription: New lessons are released every other Friday. Subscribe to receive updates

shop.heroDescription: Here you can buy original artworks, posters, stickers, and postcards
